product.name: KoKo&Yukina 10" Globe Pendant Light Black Mid Century Pendant Light Mid Century Adjustable Hanging Light Fixture Matte Black Finished with Milk Glass Lampshade for Dining Room Bedroom Kitchen Island

Q: Is the hanging cord adjustable for different ceiling heights?
A: Yes! The cord is fully adjustable to fit low or high ceilings, letting you customize the fixture’s height easily.
Q: Does the light fixture include a bulb, or do I need to buy one separately?
A: It includes a bright LED bulb—no extra purchase needed, so you can install and use it right away.
Q: What kind of after-sales support does this come with?
A: We offer professional support for any issues—if the fixture (including the shade or bulb) arrives damaged during shipping, just reach out to our team, and we’ll resolve it promptly to your satisfaction!
Q: How hard is it to install? Do I need professional help?
A: Installing the fixture is a breeze! It comes with detailed installation instructions, so you can easily complete the setup on your own—no professional help needed!
We create the best quality luminaires to meet our customers' exacting requirements for quality, durability and artistry.
We always keep close contact with our customers to collect and give feedback on their needs and opinions to provide better services to them.
We ensure the quality and safety of every luminaire product.
product.bullet_points:
• [ Size and Design ] This black ceiling milk white pendant wire globe light has a diameter of 10 inch, ceiling tray size of 6 inch, and the adjustable maximum length of the pendant wire is 79 inch. White milk glass globe pendant light is ideal for a variety of spaces, a pendant light featuring a sleek white glass diffuser that adds a touch of style and warmth to any room
• [ Easy to Install ] This pendant light is simple to install, just follow the instructions, easy to assemble, no need to disassemble to change the bulb
• [ Suitable for Sloped Ceiling ] This pendant light works on sloped ceilings, the height is adjustable, adjustable to a maximum of 79 inches with the adjustable cord, you can adjust the height according to your position, it can be either a ceiling light or a high hanging light
• [ Bulb Included ] Uses one medium sized head (E26) bulb. Works with incandescent, LED, CFL, halogen and color-changing bulbs (up to 63 watts, included). Fully dimmable when used with dimmable bulbs and compatible dimmer switch (not included)
• [ Professional After-sales Service ] If you have any after-sales problems after purchasing the products in our store, including broken bulbs caused by collision during transportation, you can inform our after-sales staff in time, and after understanding the situation, we believe that we will provide a proper solution for you
